alert.note: Alert for Mason; Oceana (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 04 at 3:51PM EDT until August 04 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers may be heavily swamped by waves. * WHERE...Mason and Oceana counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief period of stronger north winds and waves near 4 feet is expected near Big and Little Sable Points late this afternoon and early evening.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions and do not venture out on piers. Please check with your local authorities on potential beach closures.
